carbon.widget

Interface TintedView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoCompleteEditText, Button, CheckBox, CheckedTextView, DropDown, EditText, ExpandableRecyclerView, FloatingActionButton, HorizontalScrollView, ImageView, MarshmallowEditText, NavigationView, PagerTabStrip, ProgressBar, RadioButton, RangeSeekBar, RecyclerView, ScrollView, SearchEditText, SeekBar, TableView, TextView, ViewPager

    public interface TintedView
    Interface of a view with support for tinting.
